page.title: 19CHILDREN'S FAVOURITE T.V.
page.content: Mark Aynsley,a fourth year junior at Shobnall school, has identified programmes enjoyed by 9 to 11 year olds as belonging to one of the following categories-1.Comedy 2.Science(General Information) 3.Science-fiction 4.Soap Opera 5.Cartoons 6. Crime (Adventure/ Thriller) The programmes enjoyed most were:- 1.Street Hawk(Science Fiction) and The Young Ones(Comedy) 2.The Kenny Everett Show(Comedy) and Dynasty(Soap Opera) 3.Hunter(Crime) 4.Knight Rider(Science Fiction) 5.Dallas(Soap Opera),East Enders(Soap Opera),Allo Allo(Comedy) Tomorrow's World(Science and General Information),Behind the Lines(Science and General Information),Blue Peter (Science and General Information), Miami Vice(Crime),Q.E.D.(Science and General Information). Science fiction and comedy programmes are preferred.
